00016   class Ahc2CalibrationStatusBits : public BitSet {
00017   protected:
00018     enum EAhc2CalibrationStatusBitNo { kIsDead,                        
00019                                        kNoPedestal,                    
00020                                        kNoTemperature,                 
00021                                        kisNewITEP,                     
00023                                        // bits to show that defaults were used
00024                                        kMIPConstantIsDefault,          
00025                                        kMIPSlopeIsDefault,             
00026                                        kGainConstantIsDefault,         
00027                                        kGainSlopeIsDefault,            
00028                                        kInterCalibrationIsDefault,     
00029                                        kPhysicsCalibICIsDefault,       
00030                                        kSaturationParametersIsDefault, 
00031                                        kTimeSlopesParametersIsDefault, 
00032                                        kTimePedestalParametersIsDefault, 
00034                                        // bits to show that a value was scaled (e.g. for systematic studies)
00035                                        kMIPConstantIsScaled,          
00036                                        kMIPSlopeIsScaled,             
00037                                        kGainConstantIsScaled,         
00038                                        kGainSlopeIsScaled,            
00039                                        kInterCalibrationIsScaled,     
00040                                        kPhysicsCalibICIsScaled,       
00042                                        kNumberOfBits}; // just to count the number of bits
00043 
00044   public:
00050     Ahc2CalibrationStatusBits() : BitSet(kNumberOfBits) {}
00051 
00057     Ahc2CalibrationStatusBits(const int value) : BitSet(kNumberOfBits, value) {}
00058 
00059 
00060     bool isDead()     const { return getBit(kIsDead    ); }
00061     bool noPedestal() const { return getBit(kNoPedestal); }
00062     bool noTemperature() const { return getBit(kNoTemperature); }
00063     bool isNewITEP() const { return getBit(kisNewITEP); }
00064 
00065     bool MIPConstantIsDefault()          const { return getBit(kMIPConstantIsDefault          ); }
00066     bool MIPSlopeIsDefault()             const { return getBit(kMIPSlopeIsDefault             ); }
00067     bool gainConstantIsDefault()         const { return getBit(kGainConstantIsDefault         ); }
00068     bool gainSlopeIsDefault()            const { return getBit(kGainSlopeIsDefault            ); }
00069     bool interCalibrationIsDefault()     const { return getBit(kInterCalibrationIsDefault     ); }
00070     bool PhysicsCalibICIsDefault()     const { return getBit(kPhysicsCalibICIsDefault     ); }
00071 
00072     bool saturationParametersIsDefault() const { return getBit(kSaturationParametersIsDefault ); }
00073     bool TimeSlopesParametersIsDefault() const { return getBit(kTimeSlopesParametersIsDefault ); }
00074     bool TimePedestalParametersIsDefault() const { return getBit(kTimePedestalParametersIsDefault ); }
00075 
00076     bool hasDefault() const { return MIPConstantIsDefault() ||
00077                                 MIPSlopeIsDefault() ||
00078                                 gainConstantIsDefault() ||
00079                                 gainSlopeIsDefault() ||
00080                                 interCalibrationIsDefault() ||
00081                                 PhysicsCalibICIsDefault() ||
00082                                 saturationParametersIsDefault() ||
00083                                 TimeSlopesParametersIsDefault() ||
00084                                 TimePedestalParametersIsDefault(); }
00085 
00086 
00087     bool MIPConstantIsScaled()          const { return getBit(kMIPConstantIsScaled          ); }
00088     bool MIPSlopeIsScaled()             const { return getBit(kMIPSlopeIsScaled             ); }
00089     bool gainConstantIsScaled()         const { return getBit(kGainConstantIsScaled         ); }
00090     bool gainSlopeIsScaled()            const { return getBit(kGainSlopeIsScaled            ); }
00091     bool interCalibrationIsScaled()     const { return getBit(kInterCalibrationIsScaled     ); }
00092     bool PhysicsCalibICIsScaled()     const { return getBit(kPhysicsCalibICIsScaled     ); }
00093 
00094     bool hasScaled() const { return MIPConstantIsScaled() ||
00095                                MIPSlopeIsScaled() ||
00096                                gainConstantIsScaled() ||
00097                                gainSlopeIsScaled() ||
00098                                interCalibrationIsScaled() ||
00099                                PhysicsCalibICIsScaled(); }
00100 
00101 
00102     void setDead( const bool state = true )                       { setBit(kIsDead    , state); }
00103     void setNoPedestal( const bool state = true )                 { setBit(kNoPedestal, state); }
00104     void setNoTemperature( const bool state = true )              { setBit(kNoTemperature, state); }
00105     void setisNewITEP(const bool state = true )                   { setBit(kisNewITEP, state); }
00106 
00107     void setMIPConstantDefault( const bool state = true )          { setBit(kMIPConstantIsDefault          , state); }
00108     void setMIPSlopeDefault( const bool state = true )             { setBit(kMIPSlopeIsDefault             , state); }
00109     void setGainConstantDefault( const bool state = true )         { setBit(kGainConstantIsDefault         , state); }
00110     void setGainSlopeDefault( const bool state = true )            { setBit(kGainSlopeIsDefault            , state); }
00111     void setInterCalibrationDefault( const bool state = true )     { setBit(kInterCalibrationIsDefault     , state); }
00112     void setPhysicsCalibICDefault( const bool state = true )       { setBit(kPhysicsCalibICIsDefault       , state); }
00113     void setSaturationParametersDefault( const bool state = true ) { setBit(kSaturationParametersIsDefault , state); }
00114     void setTimeSlopesParametersDefault( const bool state = true ) { setBit(kTimeSlopesParametersIsDefault , state); }
00115     void setTimePedestalParametersDefault( const bool state = true ) { setBit(kTimePedestalParametersIsDefault , state); }
00116 
00117     void setMIPConstantScaled( const bool state = true )          { setBit(kMIPConstantIsScaled          , state); }
00118     void setMIPSlopeScaled( const bool state = true )             { setBit(kMIPSlopeIsScaled             , state); }
00119     void setGainConstantScaled( const bool state = true )         { setBit(kGainConstantIsScaled         , state); }
00120     void setGainSlopeScaled( const bool state = true )            { setBit(kGainSlopeIsScaled            , state); }
00121     void setInterCalibrationScaled( const bool state = true )     { setBit(kInterCalibrationIsScaled     , state); }
00122     void setPhysicsCalibICScaled( const bool state = true )       { setBit(kPhysicsCalibICIsScaled       , state); }
